attributes.action: Stop all building works for top cliff farm Morley
attributes.additional_details:
I feel the local government do not have he best interest of not just Morley or Leeds but the uk or the world. With temperature soaring & with the uk wanting to cut the carbon foot print. destroying more brown or green which will have a huge impact on this is unacceptable. 
Not to mention More traffic more lighting all of which will increase carbon
Plus with the impact on the nhs which is at breaking point with covid to add more pressure with the impact of people mental heath due to no gree space
attributes.background: With the current climate I would recommend the stopping of building more logistics company’s on top cliff farm and make it only available to be for agriculture purposes only.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local planning decisions are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
